name: Gatestone & Co.
tagline: BPO and Contact Center North America
description:
Incorporated in 1978, Gatestone & Co. is a privately owned accounts receivable management and call centre services company. Our strategy is to focus on the largest financial institutions, various government bodies and utility companies in Canada and United States. Gatestone & Co. is a leader in credit card recovery programs for a number of financial institutions in both countries. Gatestone & Co.
has a highly experienced management team, with decades of work experience, both nationally and internationally. Our forward thinking leadership allows us to develop strong strategies and deliver top performance results for our clients.
